subject: Re: [junit] Junit Design Patterns.
msgSnippet: ... Hi Farenn, Look at cookstour that is in the doc directory of the junit distribution.  It also appeared in The Java Report Dave -- Dave Astels
messageBody:
On Wed, 2002-10-09 at 21:57, nodoubt1222 wrote:
> Hi, I was just wondering if someone could tell me about design
> patterns in JUnit, or some links to good sites for information.

Hi Farenn,

Look at "cookstour" that is in the doc directory of the junit
distribution. It also appeared in "The Java Report"

Dave
--
